__e: Alan, you told me that you didn't do anything.
Well, Alan called and told me that you were doing something stupid.
Alan actually told me not to talk to anybody about this.
ALAN AND HIS BUDDIES? MMM... NO TO MAYBE.
Yes, well, if that was the plan, if that fits in with you and Alan, it's absolutely fine with me.
It isn't that I don't wish you both well, I do, I just... what with Alan and all that business going on, I just...
Well, Alan has a new place now.
Was that why Alan called last night? Uh...
Hey, buddy, this is a little awkward, but Alan has a slight issue with your friends.
Alan, I neither want nor need your money.
You know, Alan, she never told me any of this.
Unless Alan came up to 20, there's not really much to talk about.
If Alan just .. went away, don't you ..?
So, my question to you, Alan, is:
He's a true friend. Right or wrong, doesn't matter.
Boy, this is an Alan Harper I haven't seen before.
Okay, you've asked, "Who is Alan Harper?" And you deserve the truth.
All right, all right, just tell your manager that Alan Harper would like to speak with him when he has a moment.
